name: Aberline - Chapter 2: Long Road to The Swordsman Academy
name_original: Aberline - Chapter 2: Long Road to The Swordsman Academy
description:
Aberline is a free RPG Adventure game with an anime graphic style which is divided into Chapters with different titles for each chapter, and each chapter can be played for approximately 2 to 3 hours.

Aberline - Chapter 2 : Long Road to The Swordsman Academy continue the previous adventure that you can see in Chapter I, hope you will enjoy it too.

This game still has some things to improve, your constructive feedback will be very valuable for us.
